explains: n. 杜松；桧或刺柏属植物；（美）桧状植物（多用于装饰）

sentences.en: If I die, bury me under the juniper-tree.
sentences.cn: 如果我死了，就把我埋在桧树下。

sentences.en: In front of the house there was a court, in which grew a juniper-tree.
sentences.cn: 房子前面有一个院子，院子里种着一棵桧树。

sentences.en: Her husband buried her under the juniper-tree, and wept bitterly for her.
sentences.cn: 她的丈夫把她埋在桧树下，为她痛哭流涕。
